numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Across all major sports leagues, the percentage of coaches of color is significantly lower than the percentage of players of color.
2. In the basketball leagues, the percentage of players of color is the highest among the major sports leagues.
3. In Major League Soccer, the percentage of coaches of color is the highest among the major sports leagues.
4. I wonder how much the percentages of coaches of color will change in the next 10 years.
5. In some of these leagues, many new coaches of color were signed recently.
6. In the past year, coaches of color were hired at a certain rate.
7. If the next 10 years go at this rate, then coaching positions will look more diverse.
8. This situation does not have much impact on me and my community.
9. There are no professional sports leagues in my community.
10. My community is not very diverse.
11. These graphs show how diverse some of these leagues are.
12. The title is: Professional Athletes are diverse, their coaches do not share the same fate.
